item.content:encoded:
Macgregor 26 Sail Yacht

Home » Yachts » Macgregor 26 Sail Yacht

  • 120 Minutes
  • Available on request
  • Colaba, Maharashtra

Macgregor 26 Sail Yacht

Macgregor 26 yacht is the most popular yacht for cruising in Mumbai. It can comfortably accommodate 6 people and 1 sailor. It has a spacious cabin and one can sit on deck. The boat is powered entirely by its 2 sails while cruising. It is the most popular and affordable yacht to charter in Mumbai.
Yachting in Mumbai on Macgregor 26 is one of the best experiences one can have because of its design luxury cabin and one can enjoy a dinner date in it. Just imagine you have your special time with your loved one in the middle of the sea while you dating on a yacht that’s what whatever couple dreams.

Specifications

  • Ideal for : Couples, Family, Groups, Kids, Tourist
  • Capacity : 06 People
  • Location : Gateway of India, Colaba
  • When : All days of the week
  • Duration : 2 Hours (actual sailing time is approx. 1 hour and 30 minutes)

Inclusions

  • 90 Minutes Sailing
  • 30 Min From Jetty to Main Boat and Back
  • Life Jackets
  • Professional Sailor
  • One Water Bottle
  • Jetty Charges
  • Starting from

INR 7,499/Yacht

  • INR 9,999
Send Enquiry

Send us a booking request for a yacht.

The new entry-level yacht set the bar high for those who want to compete with it in terms of price, […]
item.content:encoded:
Fareast 26 Sail Yacht

Home » Yachts » Fareast 26 Sail Yacht

  • 120 Minutes
  • Available on request
  • Colaba, Maharashtra

Fareast 26 Sail Yacht

Fareast 26 Yacht brings a breath of fresh air to the yachting. The new entry-level yacht set the bar high for those who want to compete with it in terms of price, efficiency, and quality. It is the sportiest and easiest sailing keel craft, with beautiful lines so characteristic of Simonis-Voogd’s world-famous designs. The FAREAST 26 is conceived to be unmatched in its class, set to outperform the competition on all levels; quality, performance, comfort, and design.
Fareast 26 yacht sailing in Mumbai is a luxury and comfortable Sailing Charter in Mumbai at Gateway of India. 6 people can be accommodated on this beautiful Yacht in Mumbai. You can hire a yacht in Mumbai on an hourly basis as well Normally 90-100 min is given for sailing.

Specifications

  • Ideal for : Couples, Family, Groups, Kids, Tourist
  • Capacity : 08 People
  • Location : Gateway of India, Colaba
  • When : All days of the week
  • Duration : 2 Hours (actual sailing time is approx. 1 hour and 40 minutes)

Inclusions

  • 100 Minutes Sailing
  • Life Jackets
  • Professional Sailor
  • Water & Music
  • Jetty Charges
  • Starting from

INR 7,999/Yacht

  • INR 9,999
Send Enquiry

Lagoon 560 Catamaran Yacht

Lagoon Catamaran is a brand dedicated to life and freedom, born of a dream combining travel and the comfort of large volumes. All over the world, there are hundreds, all passionate about the sea and what we accomplish. 
Lagoon Catamaran rides are one of the best rides in the Arabian Sea. Catamaran ride on the sail as well. Lagoon 560 a capacity of 30 people can accommodate this beautiful Lagoon yacht while you can party and have a good sailing experience.

J24 Sailboat

J24 Sailing Boat with Cabin is one of the Quality Sailing boats in Mumbai. An all-time favorite and best-selling sailboat in Mumbai. Travel along the Arabian Sea situated on the west coast of India which has some of the best views from Mumbai Give a surprise on an Anniversary or Birthday to your friends and close one this season by gifting a sailing yacht for 100 mins at Gateway of India, Mumbai.
